eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; AT 03:11 PM ON OCT 14, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:22 PM OCT 15, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Goodyear Police Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Goodyear Police Department is looking for a black male, Ernest Friday, 82 years old, 5 foot 7 inches, 185 pounds with silver-gray hair, and brown eyes. Ernest was last seen wearing a gray t-shirt, black shorts, crocs, and glasses, and driving a Black 2018 Jeep Renegade, bearing Arizona wheelchair license plate of JFC42. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
